alert.note: Alert for Polk (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 8:32PM CDT until August 08 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Polk County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 831 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bolivar, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bolivar... Halfway... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
